display_long_description:
Spider Climbers is a high-energy VR platformer that puts your reflexes, agility, and creativity to the test. Inspired by the movement mechanics of Gorilla Tag, this game lets you experience the freedom of motion through hand-based locomotion—no joysticks, just pure physical climbing, swinging, and leaping.

Harness your inner spider as you navigate vertical walls, sprawling obstacles, and gravity-defying platforms. Whether you're scaling towering structures or racing against other players in multiplayer modes, every movement counts. Master your momentum, plan your route, and push your limits as you climb faster and higher than ever before.

With stylized environments, competitive time trials, and skill-based gameplay, Spider Climbers is built for players who love movement-based VR and want a workout wrapped in adrenaline. It’s not just a game—it’s a full-body challenge.
